body_html:
@Garoe I have made sure that the 64 bit toolset is being used and while I can build Release, VS2015 still fails to build the other configurations due to compiler is out of heap space.

@guschmue Thank you very much for pointing out this issue. I tried changing CMakeLists.txt but now Debug build crashes earlier due to not enough heap space for the compiler:

57>d:\tensorflow-1.2.0\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\external\eigen_archive\eigen\src\core\products\generalblockpanelkernel.h(1902): fatal error C1002: compiler is out of heap space in pass 2

I'm not sure if this fix that you propose will not uncover different issues.
